page.title: Tritanium
page.text: $itemName is a metal known to be as twice as hard as [item mod=minecraft name=diamond]. It is mainly used as a construction material in most Matter Megadrive machines, but can be used to craft [guide name=tritanium_tools] and [guide name=tritanium_armor] as well.
Tritanium can broken into 9 [item name=tritanium_nugget] and 2 ingots can be compressed to create [item name=tritanium_plate].
